name: International Conference on Emergency and Critical Care Medicine
content: On behalf of the Organizing and Program Committees we take great pleasure in welcoming academic scientists, researchers, research scholars, students and experts of application fields to Las Vegas, USA for the International Conference on Emergency and Critical Care Medicine to foster the progress in the field by contributing with your expertise to what promises to be a very comprehensive and exciting meeting, and to enjoy the immense unique artistic heritage and wonderful landscape of USA. International Conference on Emergency and Critical Care Medicine (Critical-Care-Medicine-2020), which will be held during July 13-14, 2020 at Las Vegas, USA is now an established event, attracting global participantâ€™s intent on sharing, exchanging and exploring new avenues of Emergency and Critical Care Medicine and related research and latest developments. The event will have 5-6 world level (Highly cited class) Plenary speakers, established Keynote speakers, active Invited speakers and fresh contributed speakers. In addition, variety of poster presentations along with workshops and special sessions would be interested in audience. The aim of the Critical -care-medicine-2020 is to promote quality research and real-world impact in an atmosphere of true international cooperation between scientists and doctors by bringing together again the world class researchers, international communities and industrial heads to discuss the latest developments and innovations in the fields of Emergency and Crtical Care Medicine. We sincerely hope that Critical-care-medicine-2020 serves as an international platform for meeting researchers from around the world, widen professional contact and create new opportunities, including establishing new collaborations. We are looking forward to seeing you at Critical-care-medicine-2020 in Las Vegas, USA.
